Uses of Package
org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection

  • Packages that use org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection 
    Package Description
    org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.image  
    org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.video  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.alignment
    The alignment package contains implementations of face aligners.
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection
    The detection package contains implementations of face detectors.
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection.benchmarking  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection.keypoints  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.feature
    The feature package contains implementations of features that can describe a face.
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.feature.ltp
    An implementation of the local texture features and comparison measure defined by Xiaoyang Tan and Bill Triggs.
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.recognition.benchmarking  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.similarity  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.tracking
    Implementations of methods for tracking faces in videos.
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.tracking.clm  
    org.openimaj.image.processing.face.util  
    org.openimaj.tools.faces  
    org.openimaj.tools.faces.recognition  
    org.openimaj.tools.faces.recognition.options  
  • Classes in org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection used by org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.image 
    Class and Description
    DetectedFace
    A DetectedFace models a face detected by a face detector, together with the locations of certain facial features localised on the face.
  • Classes in org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection used by org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.video 
    Class and Description
    CLMDetectedFace
    A constrained local model detected face.

  • Classes in org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection used by org.openimaj.image.processing.face.detection 
    Class and Description
    CCDetectedFace
    A DetectedFace that is represented/detected by a ConnectedComponent.
    CLMDetectedFace
    A constrained local model detected face.
    CLMFaceDetector.Configuration
    Configuration for the face detector
    DetectedFace
    A DetectedFace models a face detected by a face detector, together with the locations of certain facial features localised on the face.
    FaceDetector
    Interfaces for classes that are capable of detecting faces.
    FaceDetectorFeatures
    Simple features that can be extracted from a list of detected faces and an image.
    HaarCascadeDetector
    A face detector based on a Haar cascade.
    HaarCascadeDetector.BuiltInCascade
    The set of pre-trained cascades from OpenCV.
